TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebApiServiceCollectionExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extensions for IServiceCollection for startup initialization of Web APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddMicrosoftWebApiAuthentication (this Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services, Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName = "AzureAd", string jwtBearerScheme = "Bearer", bool subscribeToJwtBearerMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents = false);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddMicrosoftWebApiAuthentication(class Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services, class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName, string jwtBearerScheme, bool subscribeToJwtBearerMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function AddMicrosoftWebApiAuthentication (services As IServiceCollection, configuration As IConfiguration, Optional configSectionName As String = "AzureAd", Optional jwtBearerScheme As String = "Bearer", Optional subscribeToJwtBearerMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents As Boolean = false) As AuthenticationBuilder

static member AddMicrosoftWebApiAuthentication : Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection * Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration * string * string * bool -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder

Docs.param: Service collection to which to add authentication.
The Configuration object.
The configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
The JwtBearer scheme name to be used. By default it uses "Bearer".
Set to true if you want to debug, or just understand the JwtBearer events.
Docs.summary: Protects the Web API with Microsoft identity platform (formerly Azure AD v2.0) This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
Docs.returns: The authentication builder to chain extension methods.
